verses.verse: <WG2532> After <WG3326> this, <WG5023> I saw <WG1492> four <WG5064> angels <WG32> standing <WG2476> at <WG1909> the four <WG5064> corners <WG1137> of the earth, <WG1093> holding <WG2902> the four <WG5064> winds <WG417> of the earth, <WG1093> so that <WG2443> no <WG3361> wind <WG417> would blow <WG4154> on <WG1909> the earth, <WG1093> or <WG3383> on <WG1909> the sea, <WG2281> or <WG3383> on <WG1909> any <WG3956> tree. <WG1186>

They will never <WG2089> be <WG3756> hungry, <WG3983> neither <WG3761> thirsty <WG1372> any <WG3361> more; <WG2089> neither <WG3761> will the sun <WG2246> beat <WG4098> on <WG1909> them, <WG846> nor <WG3761> any <WG3956> heat; <WG2738>
